ARABIC: وَقِيلَ لَهُمْ أَيْنَ مَا كُنتُمْ تَعْبُدُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: They will be asked, 'Where are those you used to worship besides Allah?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: They will be asked: "Where are those you worshipped
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and they will be asked: "Where are the gods that you worshipped
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: who will be asked, "What did you worship
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And it will be said to them, “Where are those whom you used to worship?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And it will be said to them: "Where are those that you used to worship."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And it shall be said to them: Where are those that you used to worship;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: It shall be said to them, 'Where is that you were serving
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And it will be said unto them: Where is (all) that ye used to worship
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: they will be asked, "Where are those whom you worshipped
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And it shall be said unto them where is that which ye were wont to worship?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and they shall be told: ‘Where is that which you used to worship
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And it shall be said to them: 'Where are the (gods) ye worshipped-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And it will be said to them: "Where are those (the false gods whom you used to set up as rivals with Allah) that you used to worship
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: It will be said to them: 'Where is that you worshipped,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And it will be said to them, “Where are those you used to worship?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And it will be said to them, "Where are those you used to worship
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [26:92] And it will be said to them, ‘Where is that which you used to worship
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And it will be said unto them) it will be said to the idol worshippers: (Where is (all) that ye used to worship) of idols in the life of the world, 413
